law.catch_line: Office Of Medicaid To Attribute Members To Primary Care Providers
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 224, Sec. 131 effective November 4, 2012.] To the maximum extent possible, the office of Medicaid shall attribute every member to a primary care provider. Members may change their primary care provider, provided that the member gives notice to the office of Medicaid.
